dsOverview.title: Kleespies' Nimbus-3 Infrared Spectrometer (SIRS A and B), April 1969 to April 1971

summary.p: This dataset contains radiance data from the Nimbus-3 Satellite Infrared Spectrometer (SIRS) A and B instruments. The data are available for various periods between April 1969 and April 1971.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: COLOSTATE/ATMOS > Department of Atmospheric Science, Colorado State University

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Infrared Wavelengths > Brightness Temperature
